Posts.Content: I have been on this for a month and have got alot of the side effects going to the Doctors tomorrow, can anybody​ recommend anything else. Not had any since Sunday so the last few nights​ have been a nightmare. And I have been blaming the Tamoxifen for the last month
Posts.Title: Venlafaxine

Posts.Content: Hi, Elaine I was on them to try and help with the hot flushes. Couldn't get an appointment with GP before they run out so had to stop them suddenly. 37.5 Mg Can't stand heart racing and nervousness, Doctor has now prescribed Gabapentin . Typing this in tears, don't know why!Â
Posts.Title: Venlafaxine
